items.sentence: Maybe someone here can help us find Tom\'s house.
Maybe you\'d better go and see what Tom is doing.
My back hurts because I\'ve been fishing all day.
Thank you for inviting me to your birthday party.
The police found my bicycle that had been stolen.
The professor treated her as one of his students.
The stone was so heavy that nobody could lift it.
The time will come when you will understand this.
I bring my children to the park almost every day.
I called to apologize for not being able to come.
